Event: End of the Pleistocene and beginning of the Holocene epoch
Epoch of the Julian day system: Julian day 0 starts at Greenwich noon on January 1, 4713 BC of the proleptic Julian calendar, which is November 24, 4714 BC in the proleptic Gregorian calendar
Beginning of the Meghalayan age, the current and latest of the three stages in the Holocene era.
Beginning of the Common Era and Anno Domini, from the estimate by Dionysius of the Incarnation of Jesus
Epoch of the Before Present dating scheme
Current year (74 YAP) in the Before Present dating scheme
